fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Soothe a player, healing them, but roleblocking them.
- (Rehearsal) Cause a distraction at a player's house, forcing their neighbors and their neighbors' visitors to visit them, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Untune your strings, causing hearing issues, which prevents your target from seeing the day chat or talking in it. They also can't vote.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Yes, you still roleblock Band members.
